Field.name: EquipmentLength
Field.comment: Length (in feet and inches) of equipment ordered or used to transport shipment (The format is FFFII where FFF is feet and II is inches; the range for II is 00 through 11)

Field.name: WeightCapacity
Field.comment: Capacity of car ordered (stated in 1000 pound units or 1000 kilogram units)

Field.name: CubicCapacity
Field.comment: Capacity of car ordered (cubic feet unless otherwise specified)

Field.name: CarTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying type of rail car or intermodal equipment type and its general characteristics

Field.name: MetricQualifier
Field.comment: Code used to indicate that measurements are given in metric units

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: LadingPercentQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying type of lading percentage

Field.name: EquipmentDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of equipment used for shipment

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either N507 or N508 is present, then the other is required.
